properties.name: BEFORE_NEW
properties.description: Dispatched before a Document is created. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

properties.name: BEFORE_OPEN
properties.description: Dispatched before a Document is opened. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

properties.name: AFTER_CLOSE
properties.description: Dispatched after a Document is closed. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

properties.name: AFTER_CONTEXT_CHANGED
properties.description: Dispatched after the active context changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

properties.name: AFTER_SELECTION_CHANGED
properties.description: Dispatched after the active selection changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

properties.name: AFTER_SELECTION_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED
properties.description: Dispatched after an attribute on the active selection changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

properties.name: BEFORE_DEACTIVATE
properties.description: Dispatched before the Application becomes inactive. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

properties.name: AFTER_ACTIVATE
properties.description: Dispatched after the Application becomes active. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

properties.name: BEFORE_QUIT
properties.description: Dispatched before the Application is quit. Allows the quit to be canceled. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

properties.name: AFTER_QUIT
properties.description: Dispatched when the Application is quitting. Since the quit has been committed, it can not be canceled. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

properties.name: imageIOPreferences
properties.description: The image I/O preference properties that define preferences for importing images.

properties.name: polygonPreferences
properties.description: Polygon preference properties to use to define default settings for creating a polygon.

properties.name: allObjectStyles
properties.description: All object styles contained by the Application.

properties.name: pageItemDefaults
properties.description: The default page item formatting for the Application.

properties.name: frameFittingOptions
properties.description: The frame fitting option to apply to placed or pasted content. Can be applied to a frame, object style, or document or to the application.

properties.name: allParagraphStyles
properties.description: Lists all paragraph styles (regardless of their group).

properties.name: allCharacterStyles
properties.description: Lists all character styles (regardless of their group).

properties.name: textWrapPreferences
properties.description: The text wrap preference properties that define the default formatting for wrapping text around objects.

properties.name: scriptArgs
properties.description: Arguments to pass to a script.

properties.name: exportForWebPreferences
properties.description: The default export for web preferences.

properties.name: contentPlacer
properties.description: The Content Placer. Used to get a reference to the content placer object.

properties.name: linkingPreferences
properties.description: The links preference properties that define preferences for links.

properties.name: unusedSwatches
properties.description: The swatches that are not being used.

properties.name: colorSettings
properties.description: Color setting properties that define color management defaults.

properties.name: typeContextualUiPrefs
properties.description: Preferences for showing contextual ui for alternates.

properties.name: indexGenerationOptions
properties.description: The index options properties that define how an index is formatted.

properties.name: pdfExportPreferences
properties.description: A collection of PDF export preferences.

properties.name: pdfPlacePreferences
properties.description: The PDF place preference properties that define how PDF files are placed in the current document.

properties.name: fullName
properties.description: The full path to the Application, including the name of the Application.

properties.name: filePath
properties.description: The full path to the file.

properties.name: activeScript
properties.description: The current script running from the Scripts panel.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: If true, the Application is visible.

properties.name: clipboardPreferences
properties.description: Clipboard preference properties that define the way that the application interacts with the system clipboard.

properties.name: transformPreferences
properties.description: Transform preference properties that define default behaviors when transforming objects. Note: Transforming includes rotation, scaling, flipping, and shearing.

properties.name: modalState
properties.description: If true, a modal dialog or alert is active.

properties.name: activeScriptUndoMode
properties.description: The undo mode for the current script execution.

properties.name: undoName
properties.description: The name of the action on the top of the undo stack.

properties.name: redoName
properties.description: The name of the action on the top of the redo stack.

properties.name: undoHistory
properties.description: The names of the items in the undo stack.

properties.name: redoHistory
properties.description: The names of the items in the redo stack.

properties.name: incopyExportOptions
properties.description: Export options for InCopy INCX document format.

properties.name: placeableFileExtensions
properties.description: Lists the extensions of file types that can be placed.

properties.name: placeableFileTypes
properties.description: Lists the types of files that can be placed.

properties.name: layoutGridData
properties.description: Default properties specific to layout grids.

properties.name: storyGridData
properties.description: Default properties specific to frame grids.

properties.name: gridPrintingPreferences
properties.description: Grid printing preference and export settings.

properties.name: grabberPreferences
properties.description: Grabber preference properties that define display performance quality during scrolling.

properties.name: allPreflightObjectTypes
properties.description: The list of all object types (strings) a preflight rule can operate on.

properties.name: allPreflightRuleCategories
properties.description: The list of all categories that have been declared by rules.

properties.name: allPreflightRuleIDs
properties.description: The list of all known (declared) rule IDs.

properties.name: dataMergeOptions
properties.description: The data merge option properties that define the data merge.

properties.name: homeScreenVisible
properties.description: Get whether home screen is visible or not.

properties.name: epubViewingAppsPreferences
properties.description: EPub export preview app preference settings.

properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The parent of the Application (a Application).

properties.name: conditions
properties.description: A collection of conditions for conditional text.

properties.name: conditionSets
properties.description: A collection of condition sets for conditional text.

properties.name: objectStyleGroups
properties.description: A collection of object style groups.

properties.name: paragraphStyleGroups
properties.description: A collection of paragraph style groups.

properties.name: characterStyleGroups
properties.description: A collection of character style groups.

properties.name: tableStyleGroups
properties.description: A collection of table style groups.

properties.name: cellStyleGroups
properties.description: A collection of cell style groups.

properties.name: xmlExportMaps
properties.description: A collection of XML export maps.

properties.name: xmlImportMaps
properties.description: A collection of XML import maps.

properties.name: xmlRuleProcessors
properties.description: A collection of XML rule processors.

properties.name: paraStyleMappings
properties.description: A collection of para style mappings.

properties.name: charStyleMappings
properties.description: A collection of char style mappings.

properties.name: tableStyleMappings
properties.description: A collection of table style mappings.

properties.name: cellStyleMappings
properties.description: A collection of cell style mappings.

properties.name: mixedInkGroups
properties.description: A collection of mixed ink groups.

properties.name: indexingSortOptions
properties.description: A collection of indexing sort options.

properties.name: dashedStrokeStyles
properties.description: A collection of dashed stroke styles.

properties.name: dottedStrokeStyles
properties.description: A collection of dotted stroke styles.

properties.name: stripedStrokeStyles
properties.description: A collection of striped stroke styles.

properties.name: pdfExportPresets
properties.description: A collection of PDF export presets.

properties.name: backgroundTasks
properties.description: A collection of background task objects.

properties.name: scriptMenuActions
properties.description: A collection of script menu actions.

properties.name: flattenerPresets
properties.description: A collection of transparency flattener presets.

properties.name: languagesWithVendors
properties.description: A collection of languages with vendors.

properties.name: clearOverridesWhenApplyingStyle
properties.description: Clear overrides first before applying object style

properties.name: selection
properties.description: The selected object(s). Can also accept: Object or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: activeWindow
properties.description: The front-most window. Can return: Window, LayoutWindow or StoryWindow.

properties.name: liveScreenDrawing
properties.description: Delay before mouse operations trigger live screen drawing of page items.

properties.name: selectionKeyObject
properties.description: The key object of the selection. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: label
properties.description: A property that can be set to any string.

properties.name: userName
properties.description: The user associated with the tracked changes and notes.

properties.name: userColor
properties.description: The color assigned to the tracked changes and notes created by the user, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as an InCopy UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.

properties.name: findChangeTextOptions
properties.description: Find/change text options. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: findChangeGrepOptions
properties.description: Find/change grep options. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: findChangeGlyphOptions
properties.description: Find/change glyph options. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: findChangeObjectOptions
properties.description: Find/change object options. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: findTextPreferences
properties.description: Find text preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: changeTextPreferences
properties.description: Change text preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: findGrepPreferences
properties.description: Find grep preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: changeGrepPreferences
properties.description: Change grep preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: findGlyphPreferences
properties.description: Find glyph preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: changeGlyphPreferences
properties.description: Change glyph preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: findObjectPreferences
properties.description: Find object preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: changeObjectPreferences
properties.description: Change object preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: findChangeTransliterateOptions
properties.description: Find/change transliterate options. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: findTransliteratePreferences
properties.description: Find transliterate preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: changeTransliteratePreferences
properties.description: Change transliterate preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

parameters.name: printDialog
parameters.description: Whether to invoke the print dialog (Optional)

parameters.name: using
parameters.description: Printer preset to use. Can accept: PrinterPresetTypes enumerator or PrinterPreset. (Optional)

methods.description: Prints the specified file(s).

methods.name: clearFrameFittingOptions
methods.description: Removes the frame fittings options and resets it to the initial state.

parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The resolution strategy to employ for imported styles that have the same names as existing styles. (Optional)

parameters.name: strokeStyleList

methods.description: Loads a set of XML markup tags from the specified file.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The full path to the file in which to save the tags.

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.description: The comment for this version. (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.description: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

methods.description: Saves a set of tags to an external file.

methods.name: cut
methods.description: Cuts the selection in the active document window and stores it in the clipboard.

methods.name: copy
methods.description: Copies the selection in the active document window to the clipboard.

methods.name: paste
methods.description: Pastes data from the clipboard into the active document window.

methods.name: pasteInto
methods.description: Pastes data from the clipboard into the selected object in the active document window.

methods.name: pasteInPlace
methods.description: Pastes data from the clipboard into the active document window at the same position that the data held in its original document.

methods.name: getUntitledCount
methods.description: Gets the count which will be used in the name of the next untitled document.

methods.name: setUntitledCount

parameters.name: untitledCount
parameters.description: The count to be used in the name of the next untitled document. Only positive values are expected

methods.description: Sets the count which will be used in the name of the next untitled document.

methods.name: colorTransform

parameters.name: colorValue
parameters.description: source color value

parameters.name: sourceColorSpace
parameters.description: source color space

parameters.name: destinationColorSpace
parameters.description: destination color space

methods.description: Transforms color values

methods.name: pasteWithoutFormatting
methods.description: Pastes data (minus formatting) from the clipboard into the active document window.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The swatch file or InDesign document.

parameters.name: versionComments

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.description: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

parameters.name: to

parameters.name: from

methods.name: select

parameters.name: selectableItems
parameters.description: The objects to select. Can accept: Object, Array of Objects, NothingEnum enumerator or SelectAll enumerator.

parameters.name: existingSelection
parameters.description: The selection status of the Application in relation to previously selected objects. (Optional)

methods.description: Selects the specified object(s).

methods.name: applyShortcutSet

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The shortcut set. (Optional)

methods.description: Applies the specified shortcut set file. No string will apply the default shortcut set.

methods.name: applyWorkspace

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The workspace. (Optional)

methods.description: Applies the specified workspace.

methods.name: applyMenuCustomization

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The menu customization set. (Optional)

methods.description: Applies the specified menu customization set. An empty string will reset all menus and colorization (Show Full Menus). No string will apply the default menu set.

methods.name: togglePanelSystemVisibility
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of the entire panel system.

methods.name: open

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The file path(s) to the document, book, or library. Can accept: File or Array of Files.

parameters.name: showingWindow
parameters.description: If true, opens the document in a window. If false, the document is opened but is not displayed in a window. (Optional)

parameters.name: openOption
parameters.description: How to open the document. (Optional)

methods.description: Opens the specified document, book, or library.

methods.name: quit

parameters.name: saving
parameters.description: The option to use for saving changes to open documents before quitting. (Optional)

methods.description: Quits the application.

methods.name: doScript

parameters.name: script
parameters.description: The script to execute. Can accept: File, String or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the script to execute. If not specified, uses the language used to call this method. (Optional)

parameters.name: withArguments
parameters.description: An array of arguments passed to the script. (Optional)

parameters.name: undoMode
parameters.description: How to undo this script. (Optional)

parameters.name: undoName
parameters.description: The name of the undo step for entire script undo mode. (Optional)

methods.description: Executes the script in the specified language as a single transaction.

methods.name: activate
methods.description: Makes the application the front-most or active window.

methods.name: cascadeWindows
methods.description: Cascades all document windows.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key.

methods.name: extractLabel

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key.

methods.description: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

methods.name: findKeyStrings

parameters.name: for
parameters.description: The string to search for.

methods.name: waitForAllTasks

methods.name: createCustomMiniFolio

parameters.name: miniFolioDescription
parameters.description: A dictionary describing the custom mini folio to create. Can accept: Ordered array containing key:String, value:Boolean, Long Integer, Long Long Integer, String, File or Array of Any Types.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The location to write the file.

methods.description:
Create a mini-folio out of asset and overlay descriptions.

Schema for the mini folio description:
|| Key || Type || Required? || Description ||
| contentstackid | string | yes | The explicit ID to be used for this stack |
| tocImage | file | no | The TOC image for the mini-folio |
| narrowdimension | int | no | Targetted export size, measured along narrow dimension |
| widedimension | int | no | Targetted export size, measured along wide dimension |
| smoothscrolling | @enum(SmoothScrollingOptions) | no | The smooth scrolling behavior for this stack (default is noSmoothScroll) |
| locationforgeneratedassets | file | no | If included, this is an existing directory where the generated assets should be created. |
| overlays | array | no | see the SDK Overlay Builder APIs |
| assets | array | yes | The assets for the mini - folio, described below. |
| assetDependencies | array | no | Files that are needed by the asset, that will be included in the package but not the manifest. |
| metadata | array | no | The metadata for the mini-folio described below. |
| showprogressbar | boolean | no | Either true or false to indicate whether we should show a progress bar (default is false) |
| targetviewerversion | string | no | If provided (in the form "major.minor.revision") a folio compatible with the viewer version is produced. If omitted, the latest folio format is produced. | CS5 |

The following are fields in the array for "assets":
|| Key || Type || Required? || Description ||
| file | file | yes | The asset file |
| type | string | yes | The asset file type, either "web" for HTML or "image" for a raster |
| width | int | yes | The asset width |
| height | int | yes | The asset height |
| orientation | string | yes | The asset orientation, either "portrait" or "landscape" |
| thumbnail | file | no | A thumbnail of the asset to be used in browse mode |
| scrubber | file | no | A thumbnail of the asset to be used in scrubber mode |

The following are fields in the array for "assetDependencies":
|| Key || Type || Required? || Description ||
| file | file | no | The dependent file |
| relativePath | string | no | The relative path to the file, for use in the package |

The following are fields in the array for "metadata":
|| Key || Type || Required? || Description ||
| any string | string or boolean | no | any key/value where the key is a string, and the value is either a string or a boolean, such as those described in "export folio meta data" |

methods.name: exportArticleFolio

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The location to write the file.

parameters.description: The InDesign document for the stack's portrait orientation.

parameters.name: landscapeDocument
parameters.description: The InDesign document for the stack's landscape orientation.

parameters.description: Optional meta data for the mini folio. Can accept: Ordered array containing key:String, value:String. (Optional)

parameters.name: miniFolioParams
parameters.description: Options for exporting a mini folio. Can accept: Ordered array containing dataField:String, dataValue:Any Type. (Optional)

methods.description:
Export the specified documents to an article folio.

Note: This method behaves identically to @method(exportMiniFolio), but differs in its return value. @method(exportMiniFolio) returns an array of warning strings whereas this method returns an XML structure.
